msg: [MNG-4207] Adding IT plugin that depends on log4j, and integration test to verify non-lightweight http wagon can shade commons-logging and log4j properly

author: aconway
msg: Handle invalid AMPQ data to a cluster by closing the offending connection.
Prior to this fix, invalid data shut down the whole cluster.
